When the deer hear a combination of a 3-second- long recording of a deer’s snort and 20 seconds of a barking dog, they panic and flee rapidly.

definition.zh_def: 逃跑；迅速離開某地以避免危險或不愉快的情況。
definition.en_def: To run away from a place or situation of danger.
definition.example: The rabbit decided to flee when it saw the fox approaching.
